title: HURLEY H2O PRESENTS: SAMMY THE EXPLORER
description:
Meet Sammy, a local Sumba boy with mind for change. Working with Hurley H2O ambassadors Kai Hing and Marlon Gerber, Sammy's community now has a new well and access to clean drinking water. 

The best part? Sammy is one of many across Sumba that Hurley H2O and SurfAid Sumba were lucky to have helped.
